title: [Noxus Lore Update]: Mordekaiser & The Pale Sorceress

embed.description: Noxus is a powerful empire with a fearsome reputation. To those beyond its borders, Noxus is brutal, expansionist and threatening, yet those who look beyond its warlike exterior see an unusually inclusive society, where the strengths and talents of its people are respected and cultivated.

replies.body: Morde was updated with this long ago (2016/2017 I think) so this is nothing new. but if you're interested you can go read the shadow isles lore and the morde lore on universe ^^
Mordekaiser's had that lore for quite awhile. It's still reflected in his bio.

I had not seen the lore entry until you mentioned it.  I've been enjoying Mordelaiser's lore scraps quite a bit since they started getting updated but didn't think there would be anything major in anyone's lore outside of the shadow isles since he was so old.  The 'well' mentioned in there reminds me of Varus' lore too, cant wait to see how that all connects.
